storyInfo:
Amiya receives a request to transfer to the front lines. It is from the one member of Zima's group who is still staying behind in the Logistics Department - Natalya.
After discussion, the Doctor decides to look into the girl who submitted the application.

attributes.options: Amiya.

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, sorry, Doctor. I was spacing out.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You don't look so good.

attributes.content: Ah, um, there's a matter of some concern.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, look, it's an internal transfer application.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The applicant is Natalya Rostova.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She wants to transfer from Logistics to the front line.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: The Ursus Student Self-Governing Group...;......;Sorry, who is that?

attributes.content: Right. She's the only member working in Logistics.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I understand they appreciate her talent and efficiency.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course you'd be worried about it too. Honestly, I don't really want to approve this one.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I get it. Ursus names are hard. I'm not surprised you forgot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's one of the survivors we rescued from Chernobog, and a member of Zima's Ursus Student Self-Governing Group.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In fact, she was the only aristocrat among the refugees.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you remember that Zima's team became combat operators at their own request?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I was actually against it at first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It hasn't been that long since they were rescued...;......;I trust your judgment.

attributes.content: Right. Originally, even though they requested it themselves, I was going to convince Dr. Kal'tsit to veto the application.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They get regular psychological counseling and according to the reports, they're generally healthy, notwithstanding the occasional dark spot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know how to put it better.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Doctor, can you go check on Miss Rostova?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Okay.;......;Ugh.

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know it's kind of a pain, but you're the only one who can do it, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, this is really important. Don't be lazy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And you really don't have to take it too seriously. Just think of it as a little change of scenery.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, it's already lunchtime. No need to rush, you can go see her after you eat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.options: What's up?;......;Hey, Zima.

attributes.content: Nothing. Just saying hey, since I saw you.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hey, don't pretend you didn't hear me. I saw you stop.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Aren't you like super busy all the time? What are you doing wandering the halls?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You don't look busy.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I've got a mission. I can't be enjoying a leisurely stroll like you.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I told you not to wander before deployments, Zima.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Afternoon, Doctor.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Come on, Zima, back to the ready room. It's time to go.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Hmph. One day I'm gonna be the captain and boss you around.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: You too, Doctor. You're gonna answer to me.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I like the ambition. Let's talk about it after you've got one on me.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: As for the Doctor, well, you'll have to have won a lot more than one.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Eh.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor, you should know, I've been taking the rookie team lately.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: So if you don't have anything else, I'll get going.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.options: What do you think of Zima?

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Hm... Well, you just saw that she doesn't take well to discipline. She's very insubordinate.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: And as a warrior, at her age, it's normal to not know what you're fighting, or what you're fighting for.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: But it's especially obvious for Zima.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: She suffers from a lot of confusion. I don't know exactly what it is, but it's a bad sign and something I'm going to focus on correcting next.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.options: You mean she only looks tough?;......;*Sigh*, I'd really like to get along with her.

attributes.content: Right. Violence is a protective shell for her.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I wouldn't go so far as to say she has a fragile heart under that shell, but I can say that toughness is very fragile, in front of me.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Don't worry, Doctor. She's still a kid.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I heard she's from Chernobog. I'm sure she's carrying a lot of baggage. But she has a future.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Hah, don't worry, Doctor.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: You must know, she doesn't hate you or anything.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: In fact, she seems to reflexively attack people close to her.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: But I do have to say, I think this kid's all right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: In fact, I like her. She's got a strong sense of integrity. So even if she's confused, that integrity will keep her on the right path.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: And that's rare.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Okay, I gotta get going. Please excuse me.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Wow, it's the Doctor!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.options: Afternoon, Gummy.;......;Wow, it's Gummy!

attributes.content: Afternoon, Doctor!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Am I too short?!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hellooo, Doctor, do you see me?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You're looking good today!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Are you here to eat?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I haven't had any missions lately, so I'm helping out in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy, I brought the spices.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh, thanks, Perfumer! Just put them over there.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Did you want something to eat?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: No thank you. I'm used to cooking for myself in my workshop.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oooh, can I come eat with you sometime? I really wanna learn to use spices like you do!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Heh heh. But of course.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Gummy, can you lend a hand when you've got a minute?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hung is out on a mission and I'm a little short-handed. I need you to take this pot for me.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Sure, Uncle Matterhorn! I'll see you next time, Perfumer. And you eat well too, Doctor!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Sure. You're welcome anytime.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Is Gummy cooking today?!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Oh man, what luck!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Too bad I just ate!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Haha, I'll get seconds!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator

attributes.content: Settle down, everybody. There's enough to go around!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy sure has a lot of energy, doesn't she, Doctor?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.options: You can say that again.;......;You can say that again!

attributes.content: One time, when she fell asleep in my workshop, I heard her talking in her sleep. What she said worried me a bit.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But when I see her like this, adapting so well to life at Rhodes Island, I feel like I have nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You can't expect them to heal instantly. But given time, they'll be okay.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.options: What did she say in her sleep?;......;I sure hope so.

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor, some things call for discretion, you know?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll be keeping that secret for her. But rest assured, she doesn't need comfort, she just needs time.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You care, Doctor? Heh heh. You really worry about your operators.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But rest assured, if there was something really important, I wouldn't hold my tongue.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: A girl has her secrets, you know?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Doctor, don't be so full of yourself that you think you have to take care of everyone.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: We can look after each other too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It's time I went back to the office.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you ever find yourself tired, Doctor, you can always come sit with me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hello, Doctor.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.options: Afternoon, Istina.;......;How's the food today, Istina?

attributes.content: I've never seen you in the canteen before, Doctor.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You look like you have something on your mind, Doctor. I suggest you find a better place to stand and think than the cafeteria doorway.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hm... the rice is a little firm today, and the soup is too sweet. But I'm enjoying the vegetables.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: If there's nothing more, Doctor, I'll be going.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I have class in the afternoon.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.options: Class?

attributes.content: Yes, Hypatia's history class.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: After auditing for a while, I found Hypatia's take on history very helpful for me.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.options: Can I help you?;......;I'm great at history too!

attributes.content: Hm. No.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean to refuse you. I'm having trouble explaining, because I'm not very clear either.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hypatia's lectures are very interesting. I think you should take a listen yourself, when you have time.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Um, Doctor, did I not hear that you suffer from amnesia?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But I appreciate the offer.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'll say, I could use some guidance.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: In fact, I'm not certain the study of history will help me that much.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: However, thinking on the experiences of our forebears could provide me some inspiration.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm off to class then.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.options: Do you know where Natalya is?

attributes.content: Natalya...? You're looking for her?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Gummy told me she wants to become a front line operator. I haven't heard if her application has been approved, but from what I know of her, she is likely already preparing for the transfer.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Your aim sucks, Natalya.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't be so sure, Rosalind. I'm going to hit you.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hehe, no way in hell~
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And you gotta call me Leto now! Operator Rosa~
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Okay, Operator Leto. Let us wait and see.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: And who got you using such a big sucker?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You found it in Chernobog, right? Why not throw it away and get something new?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hup... sentimental value.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Okay. More work for you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It kinda looks like you can't move anymore. Why not take a little break?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I can still...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Agh!
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: You lack stamina, Natalya.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Being Ursus gives you a nice base to build on, but you're a long way from combat ready.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Pshh... whew... Sorry. I'll keep trying.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But your willpower is a lot stronger than I thought. Not bad.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: If you can push through this round of training, it'll be good for you, even if you don't become an operator.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Thanks for that.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hm... hm?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Take five.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Leto, you get out there and train yourself.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes, sir~
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Grace, keep an eye on her.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Doctor, it's lunchtime. You should be resting. We don't need you here.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.options: Afternoon, Dobermann.;......;I can't be here?

attributes.content: Afternoon, Doctor.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: If you're just here to say hello to me, I've got plenty to get back to.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You're slowly but surely becoming a leader. That's no bad thing, I have to say.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You can, but I have to take time to deal with you. I hope it won't be a lot.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But I guess Amiya told you we have another girl from Zima's group who wants to be an operator, and you wanted to check her out?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Don't look so surprised.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Everyone knows Amiya is very concerned about the survivors we rescued from Ursus.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You must remember Zima, Gummy, Istina, Leto——
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Well, Leto is an exception. Nothing to worry about in the combat department.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: When those four girls applied, Amiya was dead-set against it. She wanted to veto their applications. I don't know why, but she changed her mind at some point in the process.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: And so now that there's another one, it would be out of character for her not to care...
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Phew, that's enough rest. Rosalind, practice with me a while.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Wow, you're really committed.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Don't underestimate my determination to become an operator.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Alright alright.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Natalya, you still need to rest. The most important part of exercise is recovery. If you keep grinding away at it, you're just going to break your body.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Thank you, Instructor Grace, but I think I still have some strength left in me...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hey, don't worry about Dobermann, I know she looks scary...
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Grace, I can hear you.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Oh, well, you get it.
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: Yes, but don't worry.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Instructor Grace

attributes.content: What do you think of her?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.options: She's resolute.;......;She's a fighter.

attributes.content: Is she now? I don't think so.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I've seen her type. They grit their teeth, fighting hard not to think.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Doesn't it remind you of those three?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: They don't know where courage comes from, so they bite down and take on society, no matter their age.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But they do seem to be ready.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes she is. Honestly, she exceeds my expectations.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: An aristocratic young lady who can actually work hard for herself... hah.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I do understand Amiya's instinct to keep them off the battlefield.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Doctor, no one would be happy to send young people to war. Isn't the point of a soldier like me to protect kids like that?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I always blame myself for them having to go fight.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But I've come to terms with the fact that I can't save everyone.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: All I can do is teach them to fight, to protect themselves, and to get home in one piece.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Think about it, Doctor, what can you do for them?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Welcome back, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So what do you think?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Did you see something in Zima and her girls, Amiya?

attributes.content: ...Yes. That's why I've been paying more attention to them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, Doctor, I... wasn't sure if I should tell anyone about this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You know about my ability to sense a person's most powerful emotions, and to even feel them when they're directed at me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If they're not directed at me, but still strong enough, I can't feel them as clearly, but I can still sense something.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And the Ursus girls... it's hard to say.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Their situation is different.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At times, times that would seem ordinary to us, I will sense immense, overpowering emotion from them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course, their emotions are different, but they share some commonalities.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If I had to put a name to the main emotion, I think I'd have to say 'helplessness.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They are not so sad, not pained, not angry, not hopeless...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe it's not the right word. It's like... like there's an invisible wall.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's usually invisible and intangible, but it blocks them whenever they try to move forward. And they're stuck.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Is there anything we can do for them?

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are in no position to help them now, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What each operator is willing to tell us when they register their file, that's all we 'can' know about them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They may be hiding something from us. But if so, we have even less reason to dig it up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course, that doesn't include things that might adversely affect Rhodes Island. But I don't think Zima's group falls into that category.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not sure us suddenly reaching out to help them would actually be helpful.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Unprompted help is a selfish act.;......;We could just ask them.

attributes.content: Yes, I think so too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe it's just that I'm a little afraid to do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor, you're teasing again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If only it were that simple.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I feel like 'I understand you' isn't worth much.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But people love to say it. As if it fulfills their duty to provide comfort, or that it will make someone open up to them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's hard to understand someone's feelings, let alone help them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Many operators on board this vessel are the same, actually.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't share any particular experience with them, our words don't get through to them, and what we do, even if it's right, won't be what they want.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: So you didn't stop the Ursus girls from becoming operators.

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After sensing their emotions, I changed my mind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Forcing them to safety may seem to us like the right move, like it's best for them. And it probably would keep them safe, in practice.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But that would not help them heal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I really don't want to say that time heals all wounds.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I don't know any other way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All I can do is respect their choice, and protect them in my own, Rhodes Island way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I think about it like that, I feel kind of full of myself...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Rhodes Island isn't a greenhouse. You're on the right track.;......;Then just make friends with everyone.

attributes.content: Yes, but I always hope I can do more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, how to or whether to treat someone, from a physical perspective, is rarely something that needs consideration.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But when it comes to mental health, it becomes a more difficult problem.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For now, I can give only a vague answer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, you're right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we aren't in a position to help someone, we must create the position.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm just a little frustrated.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Medicine is for pain, to heal wounds. And some medicines can heal. But in any case, they can't erase the pain and suffering endured before the medicine is applied.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've always wondered if Rhodes Island could help some people, even if only a few, to forget, or at least let go of the trauma they've suffered in the past.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've realized along the way that it's really hard.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Developing the drug is only the most basic first step. There's so much more we would have to do to be able to achieve this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: At least we're already doing it.

attributes.content: Yeah. At least we are.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm kind of embarrassed that you're comforting and encouraging me over someone else's business...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Anyway, to business, I'm approving Miss Rostova's application.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope that one day she and her friends are willing to open up to us. I hope that one day, we are able to help them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope that one day... Rhodes Island can become their now home.
attributes.name: Amiya
